Sentencas: Porous strontium-doped lanthanum cobaltite (La0.5Sr0.5CoO3-delta, LSC) thin film electrodes were deposited by a metal-organic chemical solution deposition method.
Titulo: Performance stability of strontium-doped lanthanum cobaltite ceramic cathode synthesized by a wet chemical method

Sentencas: These films were used as cathodic electrodes replacing precious metal electrodes for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell (LT-SOFC) applications.
Titulo: Performance stability of strontium-doped lanthanum cobaltite ceramic cathode synthesized by a wet chemical method

Sentencas: They were characterized electrochemically and compared with devices that had platinum (Pt) cathodes.
Titulo: Performance stability of strontium-doped lanthanum cobaltite ceramic cathode synthesized by a wet chemical method

Sentencas: Pt was prepared by a DC magnetron sputtering method and LSC-YSZ-Pt and Pt-YSZ-Pt (cathode-electrolyte anode) SOFC unit cells were fabricated.
Titulo: Performance stability of strontium-doped lanthanum cobaltite ceramic cathode synthesized by a wet chemical method

Sentencas: The performance of each cell was continuously evaluated under operating conditions and the performance of fuel cells with a Pt cathode was superior to those using a LSC cathode at the initial stages of operation; however, the output power density started to decrease as a function of time due to the degradation that comes from the heat vulnerability of Pt.
Titulo: Performance stability of strontium-doped lanthanum cobaltite ceramic cathode synthesized by a wet chemical method

Sentencas: As a consequence, the performance of Pt-YSZ-Pt was significantly lower than LSC-YSZ-Pt, and the electrode resistance grew to be about four times larger compared to before operation.
Titulo: Performance stability of strontium-doped lanthanum cobaltite ceramic cathode synthesized by a wet chemical method

Sentencas: In contrast, neither the output power density nor the electrode resistance of LSC-YSZ-Pt changed during operation.
Titulo: Performance stability of strontium-doped lanthanum cobaltite ceramic cathode synthesized by a wet chemical method

Sentencas: These results imply that LSC has better long-term performance stability compared to Pt and feasibility of using ceramic electrode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Performance stability of strontium-doped lanthanum cobaltite ceramic cathode synthesized by a wet chemical method
Performance stability of strontium-doped lanthanum cobaltite ceramic cathode synthesized by a wet chemical method
